base64.name: Base64
base64.longDescription: Encode text or files into Base64 format, or decode them back.
base64.errorInvalidInput: Invalid input for the selected operation. Ensure the text is valid for decoding.
base64.errorDownload: Could not create file for download.

jsonyaml.name: JSON/YAML/Props
jsonyaml.longDescription: Convert data between JSON, YAML, and Java .properties formats.

url.name: URL Encoder
url.longDescription: Encode or decode strings for use in URLs.

hash.name: Hash Gen
hash.longDescription: Generate hash values for text or files using various algorithms.

diff.name: Text Diff
diff.longDescription: Compare two blocks of text and highlight the differences.

merge.name: Merge Tool
merge.longDescription: Combine two text versions, highlighting differences.
merge.howToTitle: How to Use the 2-Way Merge Tool
merge.errorLibLoad: Error: The diffing library (jsdiff) has not loaded yet. Please wait a moment.

instructions.1: Version A: Paste the first text version here.
instructions.2: Version B: Paste the second text version here.
instructions.3: Click the "Merge" button to combine the texts.
instructions.4: Lines unique to Version A will be prefixed with -.
instructions.5: Lines unique to Version B will be prefixed with +.
instructions.6: Common lines will be prefixed with (two spaces).

cron.name: Cron Gen
cron.longDescription: Create cron expressions with a user-friendly interface and see a live explanation.

timestamp.name: Timestamp
timestamp.longDescription: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates.

color.name: Color Picker
color.longDescription: Pick a color and get its values in different formats.

lorem.name: Lorem Ipsum
lorem.longDescription: Generate placeholder text in words, sentences, or paragraphs.

regex.name: Regex Gen (AI)
regex.longDescription: Use AI to generate regular expressions from natural language descriptions.
regex.promptLabel: Describe the pattern you want to match
regex.promptPlaceholder: e.g., match a valid email address
regex.testStringPlaceholder: Enter strings to test against the regex, one per line.
regex.errorAPI: Failed to generate regex. Please try again.
regex.errorInvalidRegex: The pattern is not a valid regular expression.
regex.errorNoRegex: Please generate or enter a regex pattern before testing.
